import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Header2 from './../layout/header2'; import Sidebar from '../layout/sidebar'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import {Constants} from '../../Constants' function Wallet() { const wallet = useSelector(state => state.wallet.wallet) const cards = useSelector(state => state.accounts.cards) const [validCards, setValidCards] = useState([]) const [currencyID, setCurrencyID] = useState(undefined) const [withdrawAmount, setWithdrawAmount] = useState(undefined) const [withdrawCard, setWithdrawCard] = useState(undefined) const [depositModalOpen, setDepositModalOpen] = useState(false) const openDepositModal = (currency_id) => { setDepositModalOpen(true) setCurrencyID(currency_id) }; const closeDepositModal = () => setDepositModalOpen(false);; const [withdrawModalOpen, setWithdrawModalOpen] = useState(false) const openWithdrawModal = (currency_id) => { setWithdrawModalOpen(true) setCurrencyID(currency_id) }; const closeWithdrawModal = () => setWithdrawModalOpen(false);; const confirmWithdraw= ()=>{ setWithdrawModalOpen(false) dispatch() } useEffect(() => { const vc = cards.filter((item, idx)=>{ return item.status === "confirmed" }) setValidCards(vc) setWithdrawCard(vc.length ? vc[0]: undefined) }, [cards]) return ( <>

) } export default Wallet;
